rooms.name: Grand Entry
rooms.description: You are in the Grand Entry. The front door is to the North, but it's locked. There are stairs leading downstairs to the South. There are two sets of stairs leading upwards on either side of the downward stairs(SouthEast and SouthWest). To the East, there is a dinning room. To the West, there is a hallway. ADD DESCRIPTION(painting)

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: You are in the dining room. You see three magenta chairs around a round table decorated by a candle. The kitchen is to the South. The Grand Entry is to the West.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You are in the kitchen. The dining room is to the North. There is a hallway to the East. A pantry is to the SouthWest. ADD DESCRIPTION(items)

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: You are in the living room. There is a door leading outside to the East and a hallway to the South.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long dark hallway. The Living room is North and there is a bathroom to the South. The entrance to the kitchen is to the West. Going further East, the hallway continues to reveal other rooms.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are in a bathroom. You notice there are 5 periwinkle toilet paper rolls in a basket. Go North to leave the bathroom.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long dark hallway. Going further West, the hallway continues to reveal other rooms. There is a door leading outside to the East. There is a small coat closet to the South.

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: You are in a small coat closet. Theres a shoe on the floor with...Is that a coin?

rooms.name: Pantry
rooms.description: You are in the pantry. DESPCRIPTIONOF ITEMS

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a hallway. The grand entry is to the East. There is an office to the South. The garage is to the West.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: You are in the garage. To exit the garage, go to the East. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: You are in an office. To exit the office, go to the North. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: BowlingAlley
rooms.description: You are in the bowling alley. To exit the bowling alley, go to the East. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Upstairs
rooms.description: You are now upstairs. To return the downstairs, go to the NorthEast or NorthWest. There are hallways to the East and West. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Hallway4
rooms.description: You are in a hallway. There are bedrooms to the South and West. To return towards the stairs and other hallway, go East.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. To return to the hallway, go to the North. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long hallway. To return towards the stairs and other hallway, go West. There is a small towel closet to the South. To go further down the hallway, go East.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long hallway. The hallway continues to the East and West. There is a bedroom to the South.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. To return to the hallway, go to the North. There is a small bathroom to the East. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are in a small bathroom. There are bedrooms to the East and West. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. To return to the hallway, go North. There is a small bathroom to the West. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long hallway. The hallway continues to the West. There is a locked door leading to a balcony to the West. There is an office to the North and a bedroom to the South.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: You are on the balcony. To return to the hallway, go to the West. DESPCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: You are in an old library filled with books. To return to the office, go South. On one of the shelves lies a ripped piece of paper.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: You are in an office. To return to the hallway, go South. There is a locked door leading to a library on the North wall. DESCRIPTION OF ITEMS

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. There is a small closet to the West. ADD DESCRIPTION OF ITEMS.

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: You are in a small closet. To return to the bedroom, go East. There is a ladder leading to the attic, to the West. ADD DESCRIPTION OF ITEMS.

rooms.name: Attic
rooms.description: You are in a run down attic. To return to the closet, go East.
